title: Expert vs. Beginner?
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Kasumin can’t believe you asked me a favor, Makiko, so you’ve finally realized my greatness, huh~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You’re the one who sent me a text saying, “I’m so bored~”, Kasumi.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Uurgh.... T-, that may be true! But you’re the one who said there was a place you wanted me to come with, weren’t you, Makiko!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well, that’s because I thought you would know more about the place since you go to Nijigaku. That is.... about the large game center in Odaiba....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Leave it to me! No school idol knows this area better than me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>For someone who claims to know the place, aren’t you quite bad at these games, Kasumi? Looks like you aren’t too great with horror games either.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>That’s not true! Kasumin just happened to not be at my best today! You’re not that good either anyway, Makiko!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I-, I’m a beginner, so it’s okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Let’s do it 1 more time! Next time, Kasumin will beat you by a landslide!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
